segments.text: This place serves good breakfasts , don't you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . But I'm not used to eating American-style breakfast .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What are you planning to do today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I saw yesterday that they rent windsurfers at the beach . I want to rent one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , but it looks fun . I always wanted to try it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can you take a little advice from a friend ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't waste your money . Windsurfing is very hard . And it will be windy today.They will charge you fifty dollars for a half-hour , and you won't be able to windsurf.You will fall and fall and fall .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But I always wanted to try it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , but it takes a long time to learn.You would spend a thousand dollars to learn it on a rental windsurfer .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I will see . How was your day at the office ?
segments.speaker: S2
